mapper.select: SELECT SLIP_NO as slipNo, ACCOUNT_PERIOD_NO as accountPeriodNo, DEPT_CODE as deptCode, SLIP_TYPE as slipType, EXPENSE_REPORT as expenseReport, REPORTING_EMP_CODE as reportingEmpCode, REPORTING_DATE as reportingDate, APPROVAL_EMP_CODE as approvalEmpCode, APPROVAL_DATE as approvalDate, SLIP_STATUS as slipStatus FROM SLIP WHERE REPORTING_DATE = #{slipDate} ORDER BY SLIP_NO
